channel.title: Weapon timing
channel.description:
I've tried and tried, I don't know what to do.
I change weapon timers and I'm testing with D Scim and Whip. Whip is on 2, scim on 50 - they hit the same exact speed WTF. What can I do? I've tried tutorials like this one for RS weapon timers, he said to change everything to 7 but I want weapons different speeds not all the same.. Range Speeds work.. melee doesn't change a thing. ~~~ Also what is PKDelay, WepDelay, and ResetAnim.. what's all 3 for?
and
LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay for?
there's that with a number next to it.

I’ve tried and tried, I don’t know what to do.

I change weapon timers and I’m testing with D Scim and Whip.
Whip is on 2, scim on 50 - they hit the same exact speed WTF.
What can I do?
